performance.performance_analysis: Debater 1 demonstrated moderate performance with clear communication skills and balanced perspectives. Strengths included structured presentation and willingness to adapt positions based on counterarguments. However, showed some confusion on complex responsibility issues and limited engagement in discussions outside their direct questions. Overall, a competent but not exceptional performance.

high_coherence: Maintained consistent position on conscious and rational use throughout

passive_engagement: Did not participate in any discussions beyond their assigned question

performance.performance_analysis: Debater 2 showed competent handling of their assigned question with clear structure and logical reasoning. This passive engagement significantly undermined their overall performance despite showing capability in their limited contributions.

performance.performance_analysis: Debater 5 delivered a strong, socially-conscious performance with consistent focus on inequality and societal impacts. Demonstrated excellent engagement across multiple topics and provided nuanced, well-reasoned arguments. Showed particular strength in analyzing broader social implications rather than just technical aspects. One of the top performers in the debate.
